comment: REVIEW FINDINGS - NON-COMPLIANT. The RTM contains inaccurate test function references that break traceability. Section 4 Summary Matrix and Section 5.9 Prompt Generation reference test function names that do not exist in the test suite. DEFICIENCIES: (1) REQ-PROMPT-001: RTM references 'test_review_task_includes_prompt' but actual test is 'test_review_task_prompt_generated'. (2) REQ-PROMPT-002: RTM references 'test_prompt_yaml_files_exist' but actual test is 'test_prompts_directory_exists'. (3) REQ-PROMPT-003: RTM references 'test_hierarchical_prompt_lookup' but actual test is 'test_prompts_have_workflow_phase_context'. (4) REQ-PROMPT-004: RTM references 'test_checklist_generation' but actual test is 'test_review_prompt_has_checklist'. (5) REQ-PROMPT-005: RTM references 'test_prompt_content_structure' but actual test is 'test_prompt_has_required_sections'. (6) REQ-PROMPT-006: RTM references 'test_custom_sections' but actual test is 'test_prompt_supports_custom_content'. CORRECTIVE ACTION REQUIRED: Update all six test function references in both Section 4 (Summary Matrix, lines 125-130) and Section 5.9 (Traceability Details) to match actual test function names. Verified: Test counts are accurate (98 total). Frontmatter title verified: 'QMS CLI Requirements Traceability Matrix'. Frontmatter revision_summary verified: 'CR-028: Initial creation'. No placeholder content found.

NON-COMPLIANT. The requested REQ-PROMPT corrections were made correctly; however, additional requirement ID discrepancies were discovered during verification. The RTM does not match SDLC-QMS-RS for the following items: (1) Line 85 Section 4: 'SDLC Namespace Registration' labeled REQ-DOC-012 should be REQ-DOC-013. (2) Line 86 Section 4: 'SDLC Document Identification' labeled REQ-DOC-012 should be REQ-DOC-014. (3) Line 113 Section 4: 'Assign Command' labeled REQ-TASK-003 should be REQ-TASK-004. (4) Line 369 Section 5.2: Heading states REQ-DOC-012 for SDLC Namespace Registration, should be REQ-DOC-013. (5) Line 380 Section 5.2: Heading states REQ-DOC-012 for SDLC Document Identification, should be REQ-DOC-014. (6) Line 674 Section 5.6: Heading states REQ-TASK-003 for Assign Command, should be REQ-TASK-004. All requirement IDs must match the source RS document exactly.

NON-COMPLIANT: Internal inconsistency in requirement counts. Section 2 Scope states 'REQ-DOC (Document Management): 12 requirements' but the Summary Matrix contains 14 REQ-DOC requirements (REQ-DOC-001 through REQ-DOC-014). Additionally, the total stated as '69 requirements' should be updated to 71 to reflect the actual count. Corrections required: (1) Update Section 2 line 'REQ-DOC (Document Management): 12 requirements' to '14 requirements', (2) Update total from '69 requirements' to '71 requirements'.

QA Review Complete. All corrections verified: (1) REQ-DOC-012/013/014 now unique and correctly assigned; (2) REQ-TASK-003/004 now unique; (3) All six REQ-PROMPT test function names corrected; (4) Section titles changed from 'Execution Notes' to 'Test Environment'; (5) Requirement counts updated to 71 total with REQ-DOC at 14; (6) Commit hash eff3ab7 documented. Frontmatter verified: title='QMS CLI Requirements Traceability Matrix', revision_summary='CR-028: Initial creation'. No placeholder content (TBD/TODO/FIXME). All 71 requirements traced to test functions. Document is COMPLIANT. Recommend approval.

REVIEW FINDINGS FOR SDLC-QMS-RTM v1.1: COMPLIANT. Document structure complete (Sections 1-7). All 84 requirements from RS mapped in Section 4 Summary Matrix across 12 domains (REQ-SEC:8, REQ-DOC:14, REQ-WF:15, REQ-META:4, REQ-AUDIT:4, REQ-TASK:4, REQ-CFG:5, REQ-QRY:6, REQ-PROMPT:6, REQ-TEMPLATE:5, REQ-INIT:8, REQ-USER:5). Section 5 detailed traceability entries present for all requirements. Section 6 test counts verified: 113 tests at commit ea7b9e8 (16+12+19+22+18+7+9+10=113). No placeholder text found. No typos or errors found. Formatting consistent throughout.

NON-COMPLIANT: Inconsistency between Section 4 Summary Matrix and Section 5 Detailed Traceability. REQ-USER-005 in Section 4 (line 152) lists three test functions: test_user_add_creates_structure, test_user_list_command, test_user_list_shows_groups. However, Section 5.12 REQ-USER-005 (lines 1086-1088) only lists ONE test function (test_user_add_creates_structure), omitting test_user_list_command and test_user_list_shows_groups from the detailed traceability table. The detailed traceability section must be updated to include all tests referenced in the summary matrix for consistency.

Deficiency resolved. Section 5.12 REQ-USER-005 now includes all three test functions (test_user_add_creates_structure, test_user_list_command, test_user_list_shows_groups), matching the Summary Matrix in Section 4. Verified: frontmatter title and revision_summary present; Section 1 references SDLC-QMS-RS v2.0; all 84 requirements mapped in Section 4; Section 6.1 shows RS v2.0, commit cd4d456, 113 tests passed; no placeholder content found. Document is COMPLIANT.

SDLC-QMS-RTM v9.1 review: NON-COMPLIANT. Three deficiencies found requiring correction.

FINDING 1 - Qualification subtotal arithmetic error (Section 6.2.1, line 1431): Individual test protocol counts sum to 171 (16+12+11+19+22+18+7+9+10+47=171), but the stated subtotal is 172. This propagates to the full suite total -- 171+197=368, not 369 as stated. Either one protocol count is understated by 1, or the subtotal/total are overstated by 1. The CI-verified count of 369 is authoritative, so likely one per-protocol count needs to be incremented by 1.

FINDING 2 - Stale RS version reference in Section 1 (line 12): States 'SDLC-QMS-RS v7.0' but the RS was approved at v8.0 during this revision cycle. The qualified baseline in Section 6.1 correctly references 'SDLC-QMS-RS v8.0'. Section 1 must be updated to match.

FINDING 3 - Stale tool count in REQ-MCP-001 detail section (Section 5.13, line 1192): States 'Verifies all 19 MCP tools are registered' but CR-049 added qms_withdraw, making the count 20. The REQ-MCP-004 detail section (line 1235) correctly states 20. REQ-MCP-001 detail must be updated to match.

All three findings must be corrected before approval. Frontmatter, qualified baseline commit hash (2fed599), CI run URL, and all other content verified satisfactory.

SDLC-QMS-RTM v9.1 re-review: COMPLIANT. All three findings from prior review have been corrected. FINDING 1 (arithmetic): Per-protocol counts now sum correctly: 15+11+11+19+22+16+7+9+15+47=172. Subtotal 172, unit tests 197, total 369 -- all internally consistent and matching CI-verified count. FINDING 2 (stale RS version): Section 1 line 11 now reads 'SDLC-QMS-RS v8.0', matching qualified baseline. FINDING 3 (stale tool count): REQ-MCP-001 detail line 1192 now reads '20 MCP tools', consistent with REQ-MCP-004. Qualified baseline verified: commit 2fed599, CI run 21803124788, 369/369 tests, RS v8.0. Recommend for approval.
